channel.title: Himat版 Steam 新規ストア公開（画像＋説明）
channel.description: Games whose Steam store page just went public (detected)

item.title: Cursed Heroes（新規追加）
item.description: Recruit. Synergize. Unleash your power. Build a party of heroes with unique class combinations. With each run, time moves forward 50 years and future generations judge your incarnations: revered as legends… or rejected as curses.
item.content:encoded:
Recruit. Synergize. Unleash your power. Build a party of heroes with unique class combinations. With each run, time moves forward 50 years and future generations judge your incarnations: revered as legends… or rejected as curses.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Star Trucker - Star Truck Owner's Manual（新規追加）
item.description: Open the Star Truck Owner’s Manual to find everything you need to get started with the Starmaster 790 - from system diagrams and maintenance tips to top-notch pre-trip check advice. There’s even a handy galaxy guide and CB chatter cheat sheet, so you’re ready for anything the galaxy throws your way!
item.content:encoded:
Open the Star Truck Owner’s Manual to find everything you need to get started with the Starmaster 790 - from system diagrams and maintenance tips to top-notch pre-trip check advice. There’s even a handy galaxy guide and CB chatter cheat sheet, so you’re ready for anything the galaxy throws your way!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Infinite Game Cartridge Collection - Decepticon Hero（新規追加）
item.description: A 2d side scrolling shooting game where you can jump, duck, float in the sky and kill robots.
item.content:encoded:
A 2d side scrolling shooting game where you can jump, duck, float in the sky and kill robots.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Falcon Fall™（新規追加）
item.description: Dropped deep in hostile territory with no backup and no way out but through. Every street is a kill zone, every shadow a threat. Built in UE5 by seasoned VR devs and combat vets, Falcon Fall™ delivers the most unforgiving tactical VR combat experience. Wishlist now - deployment scheduled for 2026.
item.content:encoded:
Dropped deep in hostile territory with no backup and no way out but through. Every street is a kill zone, every shadow a threat. Built in UE5 by seasoned VR devs and combat vets, Falcon Fall™ delivers the most unforgiving tactical VR combat experience. Wishlist now - deployment scheduled for 2026.

item.title: The Greenening Demo（新規追加）
item.description: A short and wholesome incremental journey about exploring and reawakening a forgotten world. Wash away the ashes to discover the secrets hidden beneath, upgrade your versatile watering abilities, and grow your own cozy space garden.
item.content:encoded:
A short and wholesome incremental journey about exploring and reawakening a forgotten world. Wash away the ashes to discover the secrets hidden beneath, upgrade your versatile watering abilities, and grow your own cozy space garden.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Horse Magic（新規追加）
item.description: Horse Magic is a choice-driven visual novel about Kaiah and her roommate Iris, whose bond is tested by a surreal event. Navigate love, identity, and forbidden desire through branching choices, emotional drama, and futa-themed intimacy.
item.content:encoded:
Horse Magic is a choice-driven visual novel about Kaiah and her roommate Iris, whose bond is tested by a surreal event. Navigate love, identity, and forbidden desire through branching choices, emotional drama, and futa-themed intimacy.

Steamでページを開く
